column1: If Congress does not act soon over 13 million people will be left without an income. A new COVID relief bill must be our priority.  https://t.co/2Ep53ctg5Z

Pres. Trump’s reckless disregard for the health of our community must end. With the other members of the House from our region I call on the White House to take the necessary steps to control the spread of the coronavirus.  https://t.co/MDLzhMjKot
Federal workers should not be punished for coronavirus. That’s why I introduced legislation so federal workers can carry over the leave they accrued during the pandemic.   https://t.co/JKeB2kFHUW

Trump is incapable of running this country.    Look @JoeBiden has a plan to contain Covid-19 and to build our country back better.  Joe will ensure working families and small businesses have a fair shot.  Joe will make the super-wealthy and corporations pay their fair share.

Pres. Trump lied to the American people about coronavirus and how deadly it is. He didn't have a plan.  Now 200000 Americans paid with their lives and nearly 30 million are unemployed.  Trump needs to answer for those failures tonight.
Thank you @JoeBiden for explaining the timeline of Trump's reckless dangerous incompetence on fighting the coronavirus.  We need a selfless leader.  We need Joe Biden.

Speaking tonight with @DemsProvidence about our work on suicide prevention coronavirus relief bills the possibility of a vaccine and lessening the disproportionate impact of the pandemic on Americans of lower income. https://t.co/GG7OPeZR1I

I am speaking with Northern Virginia's @Virginia_AFLCIO tonight about systemic income inequality and wealth inequality which the Covid crisis has made much worse.  I will continue to be a champion for workers as long as I am in office. https://t.co/EA0s7otyf7
Another reason to vote as early as you possibly can: you might get coronavirus. https://t.co/0U8VlCx3uG https://t.co/NLfHxiV64a

In July 31 million Americans received federal unemployment aid.  Coronavirus is not going away anytime soon. It is clear that reopening state economies is not the solution. Congress must pass a bill to extend federal unemployment benefits. https://t.co/dgXovPhXi7
COVIDWISE is a new phone app that notifies you if you have been near someone who tests positive for Covid-19. Virginians download the app at https://t.co/ukevaNnpyD! https://t.co/oN6MZUkINr

Meet Dr. Cameron Webb the Democratic nominee for US House in Virginia’s 5th district in a virtual event tomorrow at 7:30pm! This is a great opportunity to hear Dr. Webb speak about everything from responses to covid-19 to criminal justice reform.  https://t.co/Mo9eswpQ3J

Federal civilian employees and members of our military all deserve a 3% pay raise next year. They have continued to serve our communities by researching cures for covid-19 delivering mail and everything in between and they deserve our appreciation.  https://t.co/HU1twrYZEV

The Worker Relief and Security Act that I introduced is a bipartisan extension of federal unemployment assistance. Passing it would help millions of Americans find their footing as the coronavirus continues to take its toll on our families and communities. https://t.co/2hgoroXy89

Coronavirus can’t put the climate crisis on hold. That’s why I introduced the Smarter Purchasing Act: to keep the federal government moving forward when it comes to reducing carbon emissions. https://t.co/ZJfxkgjgfM

We need more covid tests not another military parade.   Trump's crazy large-scale Independence Day celebration would be a serious public health threat and financial blow in a time when we should focus on our response to the pandemic.  https://t.co/GuDLjjRyKr

My colleague @Eshoo4Congress is right: We need stronger leadership from CDC and FDA at this time when millions of Americans doubt the existence of coronavirus and the president is having dangerous large gatherings.
WATCH: Anthony Fauci and the rest of the coronavirus task force members testify before the House now -- https://t.co/bwS0QhjHIK

We need more coronavirus tests.   To get people back to work we need 25 million tests per day.  How do we do that?  Offer incentives to research labs to create fast accurate tests.  My plan with Rep. @anthonygonzalez would do just that.  https://t.co/i0KqtcZFfS

Speaking with Virginia Democracy Forward -- an effective progressive org founded since Trump's win -- about my work in Congress to help working people in this era of #covid19.  Join @VaDemocracy at https://t.co/wzfGIKeQkq. https://t.co/dvOudFogqc

Federal aid to state and local governments is crucial for containing the coronavirus and preventing economic disaster.  This aid should be a major focus of Congress’s fourth legislative response to the public health crisis.  https://t.co/WC6DNoh1dP
Please avoid restaurants and bars per Dr. Fauci's instruction.  Young people are silent carriers of #COVID19. https://t.co/J00vLVrsKw

There are now numerous cases of the new coronavirus in Northern Virginia and Washington DC.   Please limit physical contact with others especially if you are 60+ and scrub your hands often.  The latest information:  VA: https://t.co/s5Xrw2Jvna DC: https://t.co/gC5Fu4md4W
